screenshot.caption: CAK file open in VLC media player

description: The Sega CD and Sega Saturn video game consoles both played games stored on CD-ROMs . These games used video files saved using Sega's proprietary FILM video format. FILM files were saved with a variety of extensions, including .FILM_CPK , .cpk , .film , and .cak .
CAK files were used in Burning Rangers, Dark Seed II, Revolutionary Girl Utena, Lunar 2: Eternal Blue, and Phantasm, among other Sega Saturn games.
